entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump No, @Mike_Pence, b/c of @realDonaldTrump’s dangerous corruption, incompetence & negligence, the US was invaded by COVID-19 & allowed to spread like wildfire thruout the US. @realDonaldTrump is so desperate to be re-elected tht he is willing to compromise the welfare ofthe nation.
